ch.phonon.drawables

Class DrawableLine

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.phonon.drawables.AbstractDrawable
      • ch.phonon.drawables.DrawableLine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable, Positionable

    public class DrawableLine
extends AbstractDrawable
    The DrawableLine is a Drawable object representing a line.
    Author:
    phonon

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class ch.phonon.drawables.AbstractDrawable

        invariantScalingType

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DrawableLine(StarPoint starpoint, LocalOrientation localOrientation, java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double point1, java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double point2)
      This constructor is used to define a DrawableLine object by providing its StarPoint position and LocalOrientation and the coordinates of the beginning and end point of the line.

        public boolean contains(int x,

        Description copied from interface: Drawable
        Checks if the Drawable contains the coordinate (x,y) in the temView space
        Returns:
